articles.author: Michel Rose, Yun Chee Foo
articles.title: Breton steps down as France's EU commissioner, criticising von der Leyen - Reuters.com
articles.description: Thierry Breton of France stepped down as a member of the European Commission on Monday and will no longer be his country's candidate for the next EU executive body, an unexpected twist in the highly political EU power transition.

articles.author: KAREL JANICEK
articles.title: Death toll rises as torrential rain and flooding force evacuations in Central Europe - The Associated Press
articles.description: Heavy rains have caused severe flooding in Central Europe and the death toll has risen. The floods have claimed lives in Romania, Austria and Poland. In the Czech Republic, four people were missing. The situation was particularly dire in northeastern Czech re…
articles.content:
PRAGUE (AP) The death toll was rising in Central European countries on Sunday after days of heavy rains caused widespread flooding and forced evacuations.
Several Central European nations have alrea… [+6279 chars]

articles.author: Margot Patrick, Patricia Kowsmann, Joe Wallace
articles.title: The Suave Italian Banker Who Wants to Be the Jamie Dimon of Europe - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Andrea Orcel has teed up UniCredit for a potential takeover of rival Commerzbank. He wants to build something Europe lacks—a banking champion.
